programme.title: Au Revoir
programme.desc: The story of wakeboarding champion Raph Derome as he retires from riding in front of crowds and cameras. (92 minutes)

programme.title: Strike
programme.desc: Kai Lenny goes on a 24-hour strike mission to Tahiti and pushes the limits of what’s possible in the ocean. (20 minutes)

programme.title: Alaska
programme.desc: At mid-season, Kai Lenny heads to Alaska for surf and snow heli sessions with snowboarding icon Travis Rice. (24 minutes)

programme.title: Proving ground (part 1)
programme.desc: The Eddie is on and Kai Lenny has plenty to prove on the North Shore of Oahu at both Pipeline and Waimea Bay. (20 minutes)

programme.title: Proving ground (part 2)
programme.desc: Kai Lenny chases a dream win at The Eddie then takes on the World Tour’s best pro surfers at Sunset Beach. (22 minutes)

programme.title: Reset
programme.desc: Kai Lenny's balancing act looks different in 2023, and his home life and performance goals are ready to reset. (17 minutes)

programme.title: The Next Centimeter
programme.desc: Discover what it takes for pole vaulter Armand ‘Mondo’ Duplantis to raise the bar – one centimetre at a time. (26 minutes)

programme.title: Adapt or perish
programme.desc: A wave of younger, faster competitors force 'old dogs to learn new tricks' to stay in the results sheet. (32 minutes)

programme.title: Apex predators
programme.desc: In the downhill, Finn Iles struggles to beat his biggest competitor, team-mate Loïc Bruni. (28 minutes)

programme.title: Bros before foes
programme.desc: DH riders Loïc Bruni and Loris Vergier have their relationship put to the test as they compete against each. (32 minutes)

programme.title: Home run
programme.desc: As Rachel Atherton returns to MTB racing, she works to find a balance while Vali Höll prepares for success. (34 minutes)

programme.title: Iron sharpens iron
programme.desc: Mathias Flückiger and Nino Schurter confront the bitter rivalry of Swiss MTB cross-country racing. (26 minutes)

programme.title: No I in team
programme.desc: A devastating mistake by the Trek Factory Racing support crew threatens to derail Evie Richards’s comeback. (30 minutes)

programme.title: Hope
programme.desc: After a devastating injury, Marc Márquez's biggest challenge is to be what he once was, so he moves to Madrid. (33 minutes)

programme.title: Honda CT70
programme.desc: Pro stunt rider and expert builder Aaron Colton turns a clunker Honda CT70 into the pit bike of his dreams. (15 minutes)

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: Marc remembers his early MotoGP™ times and meets up with the man who was his idol back then: Valentino Rossi. (34 minutes)

programme.title: Passion
programme.desc: Marc recovers from surgery with one goal: to win again. In Austria he meets his former rival, Dani Pedrosa. (34 minutes)

programme.title: Comeback
programme.desc: It’s time for Marc to recap on a year that's seen him make some of the most difficult decisions of his life. (36 minutes)

programme.title: Campaign
programme.desc: Campaign is a comedy that mocks corporate America combined with the best pro surfing of today. (70 minutes)
